bug.short_desc: Gnome Gmail fails to launch Firefox, it only launches when Firefox is already open.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Gnome Gmail fails to launch Firefox by itself. it only launches when Firefox is open. When Firefox is closed it simply hangs.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 2.1-1.fc24
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Install gnome gmail 2. Launch gnome gmail (making sure firefox is closed / not running) 3. Quit or let gnome gmail (it will eventually quit herself) and re-launch gnome gmail but now after opening firefox first.
Actual results: Gnome gmail launches only when Firefox is open.
Expected results: For the standalone app that it is, Gnome gmail should launch the gmail page in Firefox without opening Firefox. If not so, there is no point in having this application.
Additional info: Gnome gmail is still buggy, at first install there is an error message about python crash or something.
